comments.body:
Could you make a tearDown function that removes this/all these extra connections you have set up?

(To make that tear down easier it might be easier if you use the same conn_id for each test, but with differing fields/settings etc.)

```python
with create_session() as session:
    session.query(Connection).filter(Connection.conn_id.like_("adx_test_%")).delete()
```

should do it. (Import needed)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +47,51 @@                       password='client secret',
                       host='https://help.kusto.windows.net',
                       extra=json.dumps({})))
        with self.assertRaises(AirflowException) as e:
            AzureDataExplorerHook(azure_data_explorer_conn_id=ADX_TEST_CONN_ID)
